name: BallClimbing
description:
This is a game to control beach ball climbing.
In the game, you can't use the direction key to control the movement as simple as other games, but you need to rotate the mouse to simulate the ball rolling.
There are many different types of obstacles in the game, you need to control the rolling speed of the good ball and jump through them at the right time.
This is a difficult challenge, which requires skilled operation and constant attempts.
